dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Wastewater; Sewage; Industrial discharge; Water pollution; Effluent water; Treated effluent; Effluent treatment; Purified effluent; Secondary effluent; Tertiary effluent; Final effluent; Post-treatment effluent; Effluent stream; Discharge water; Effluent discharge

Wastewater; Sewage; Industrial discharge; Water pollution; Effluent water; Treated effluent; Effluent treatment; Purified effluent; Secondary effluent; Tertiary effluent; Final effluent; Post-treatment effluent; Effluent stream; Discharge water; Effluent discharge
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The Description for the product flow of effluent covers its treatment level, including any purification or detoxification processes it has undergone. Compliance with environmental standards, its quality after treatment, potential usages, and the method of how it was produced are detailed. The nature of the substances involved in the creation of the effluent (educt name) are mentioned. It is also specified whether the effluent is part of a production mix (e.g., as a byproduct) or a consumption mix (e.g., post-use treatment), and whether it is available 'to consumer' for further use or 'at plant', indicating its location of availability, with all these details being separated by commas.
废水产品流的描述涵盖了其处理水平，包括其所经历的任何净化或解毒过程。详细说明了其符合环境标准的情况、处理后的质量、潜在用途以及生产方式。提及了参与废水产生的物质的性质（前体名称）。还具体说明了废水是作为生产混合物（例如，作为副产品）的一部分，还是消费混合物（例如，使用后处理）的一部分，并指明了其可用性位置是‘对消费者’还是‘在工厂’，所有这些详细信息都用逗号分隔。
